extendedInfo.description: â©â©â© One of a kind gameplay â©â©â©Just knocking over domino pieces was yesterday.This mind-busting physics based puzzle game has a simple and addictive objective: Hit the Goal Domino.Drag and drop the dominos into the level scenario. Knock over the first domino and watch the dominos topple till the end. Use different interactive objects to help you reach your goal. With 44 challenging levels and more to be updated, you have hours and hours of dominotoppling, jumping and puzzle solving fun awaiting you! There are infinite ways to solve the puzzles. Play the levels a several times to collect all the three star pieces. Featuresâ 8 tutorial levels + (3 worlds x 12 levels) = 44 challenging levels and more to come. â Many interactive objects that will help you (or not) to solve the puzzles.â Intuitive controls: dragging dropping and flipping.â Nice to see and fun to play artworkEasy to play but hard to master, itâs a game for ambitious puzzle solvers.
